text:
OneLogin | San Francisco, CA | Sr. Software Engineer | Onsite, Full Time | Relocation Assistance / Visa Transfer

http://grnh.se/4noulk

OneLogin is looking for great engineers. Our app is built mainly on Ruby on Rails and Javascript, but we use a lot of other technologies as well.

We are looking for people who can come in and get the job done, and have a good time doing it.
